events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and will begin our review shortly.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department for the software developer role.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your application and will contact you soon.
We conducted an initial screening call today to understand your experience with software development and your technical skills.
You responded promptly with additional details about your devops projects and coding expertise, which was appreciated.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th, focusing on software engineering principles and practical coding tasks.
